name: New Active Campaign
subject: Used to notify that a new campaign has been activated and is ready to receive donations
html_content:
1. Campaign Name --> %{campaign.name}%

2. Target Amount --> %{campaign.target-amount}%

3. Campaign Start --> %{campaign.start-date}%

4. Campaign End --> %{campaign.end-date}%

5. Campaign Link --> %{campaign.link}%
